original_text:
Elements: The Awakening
La NetEnt è una delle case di sviluppo di slot online più apprezzata al momento, grazie alla sua capacità di spaziare tra le tematiche più comuni e quelle meno utilizzate. Elements fa sicuramente parte di questa seconda categoria, utilizzando come tema gli elementi sui cui si basa la Terra (vento, fuoco e altro ancora) e che avremo modo di vedere nel dettaglio in questa nostra recensione.
Quindi bando alle ciance e cominciamo la nostra analisi parlando dell’aspetto visivo di questo gioco.
Elements: tutti gli elementi a rapporto
Elements di Netent ha un’ambientazione piuttosto atipica per quanto riguarda le slot, in quanto si concentra sui quattro elementi naturali: aria, acqua, fuoco e terra e lo fa nella loro accezione più fantasy.
Partiamo dalla cornice che riprende paesaggi tipici del genere con scorci di montagne, vallate, una scogliera e addirittura un vulcano attivo. Il tutto con colori piuttosto scuri ma ben mischiati fra loro, rendendo lo sfondo piacevole e che non stanca la vista.
Passando alla griglia della slot, invece, i simboli classici vengono sostituiti da alcune rocce che racchiudono gli elementi naturali come spifferi d’aria, gocce d’acqua, tizzoni ardenti o fulmini. Insieme a questi vi sono anche simboli speciali rappresentati come esserini d’acqua, golem di fuoco ed elettricità oppure draghi d’aria.
Elements è visivamente particolare e fuori dagli schemi. Per quanto riguarda il sonoro c’è poco da dire. Infatti non ha nessun sottofondo musicale ad accompagnare le giocate se non per una musica solenne che si sente solo durante determinate combinazioni. I suoni benché generici sono in linea con l’ambientazione fantastica della slot.
Ma ora saltiamo dalla parte estetica a quella tecnica di Elements.
Elements: ecco come giocare
Anche se l’assenza di una vera e propria griglia di gioco potrebbe farci pensare diversamente, in realtà Elements sfrutta un meccanismo 5*3 molto comune nelle slot online. I quindici simboli che appaiono ad ogni giocata si dispongono in combinazioni secondo le venti linee di vincita.
La vera novità arriva nel meccanismo a caduta: non si parla infatti di rulli in caduta, ma di simboli che cadono dall’alto. Nel caso in cui venga premiata una combinazione, i simboli coinvolti verranno assorbiti da un talismano centrale che si caricherà di un’energia, mentre altri simboli cadono dall’alto e danno la possibilità di ottenere delle vincite concatenate.
Per riempire completamente il talismano sarà necessario ottenere quattro vincite concatenate, una sfida di tutto rispetto ma che saprà premiare la pazienza e la fortuna dei giocatori che riusciranno a completarla.
Insomma: ci troviamo di fronte a un gioco originale sotto tanti punti di vista e che dimostra di essere sicuramente più interessante di molti altri titoli più acerbi che è possibile trovare online.
Titoli simili a Elements
Non è facile trovare titoli che condividano il tema di questa slot, in quanto particolarmente unico. Per questo possiamo invece scegliere di consigliare altre slot della stessa casa di sviluppo che abbiano dei punti in comune da un punto di vista tecnico. Fruit Case, sempre della NetEnt, gode anche lui di un sistema di vincite combinate con premio annesso, per chi vuole provare qualcosa di più fresco e leggero dopo l’epicità di Elements.

raw_translation.response:
Elements: The Awakening

NetEnt is one of the most appreciated online slot developers today, thanks to its ability to range from the most common themes to the least used ones. Elements certainly belongs to this second category, using as its theme the elements on which the Earth is based (wind, fire, and more), which we will see in detail in this review.

So enough talk, let's start our analysis by talking about the visual aspect of this game.

Elements: all elements accounted for

Netent's Elements has a rather atypical setting for slots, as it focuses on the four natural elements: air, water, fire, and earth, and does so in their most fantasy-centric interpretation.

Let's start with the backdrop which captures typical landscapes of the genre with glimpses of mountains, valleys, a cliff, and even an active volcano. All in colors that are rather dark but well blended together, making the background pleasant and easy on the eyes.

Moving on to the slot reel, the classic symbols are replaced by some rocks that enclose the natural elements such as drafts of air, water drops, burning coals, or lightning bolts. Along with these, there are also special symbols represented as water beings, fire and electricity golems, and air dragons.

Elements is visually unique and out of the ordinary. As for the sound, there is little to say. In fact, there is no musical background accompanying the gameplay except for solemn music that is heard only during certain combinations. The sounds, although generic, are in line with the fantastic setting of the slot.

But now let's move from the aesthetic to the technical side of Elements.

Elements: How to Play

Although the absence of a real game grid could make us think differently, Elements actually uses a very common 5x3 mechanism in online slots. The fifteen symbols that appear with each play are arranged in combinations according to the twenty paylines.

The real novelty comes in the cascading mechanism: we are not talking about falling reels, but symbols that fall from above. In the in the case of a winning combination, the involved symbols will be absorbed by a central talisman that will load with energy, while other symbols fall from above and give the opportunity to obtain concatenated wins.

To completely fill the talisman, it will be necessary to obtain four concatenated wins, a challenge in itself but one that will reward the patience and luck of players who manage to complete it.

In short: we are facing an original game in many ways and one that proves to be certainly more interesting than many other more inexperienced titles that can be found online.

Similar Games to Elements

It is not easy to find titles that share the theme of this slot, as it is particularly unique. For this reason, we can instead choose to recommend other slots from the same developer that have some technical aspects in common. Fruit Case, also from NetEnt, also enjoys a combined win system with attached prize, for those who want to try something fresher and lighter after the epicness of Elements.

Review: Elements: The Awakening

NetEnt is one of the most appreciated online slot developers today, thanks to its ability to range from the most common themes to the least used ones. Elements certainly belongs to this second category, using as its theme the elements on which the Earth is based (wind, fire, and more), which we will see in detail in this review.

So enough talk, let's start our analysis by talking about the visual aspect of this game.

Elements: all elements accounted for

Netent's Elements has a rather atypical setting for slots, as it focuses on the four natural elements: air, water, fire, and earth, and does so in their most fantasy-centric interpretation.

Let's start with the backdrop which captures typical landscapes of the genre with glimpses of mountains, valleys, a cliff, and even an active volcano. All in colors that are rather dark but well blended together, making the background pleasant and easy on the eyes.

Moving on to the slot reel, the classic symbols are replaced by some rocks that enclose the natural elements such as drafts of air, water drops, burning coals, or lightning bolts. Along with these, there are also special symbols represented as water beings, fire and electricity golems, and air dragons.

Elements is visually unique and out of the ordinary. As for the sound, there is little to say. In fact, there is no musical background accompanying the gameplay except for solemn music that is heard only during certain combinations. The sounds, although generic, are in line with the fantastic setting of the slot.

But now let's move from the aesthetic to the technical side of Elements.

Elements: How to Play

Although the absence of a real game grid could make us think differently, Elements actually uses a very common 5x3 mechanism in online slots. The fifteen symbols that appear with each play are arranged in combinations according to the twenty paylines.

The real novelty comes in the cascading mechanism: we are not talking about falling reels, but symbols that fall from above. In the in the case of a winning combination, the involved symbols will be absorbed by a central talisman that will load with energy, while other symbols fall from above and give the opportunity to obtain concatenated wins.

To completely fill the talisman, it will be necessary to obtain four concatenated wins, a challenge in itself but one that will reward the patience and luck of players who manage to complete it.

In short: we are facing an original game in many ways and one that proves to be certainly more interesting than many other more inexperienced titles that can be found online.

Similar Games to Elements

It is not easy to find titles that share the theme of this slot, as it is particularly unique. For this reason, we can instead choose to recommend other slots from the same developer that have some technical aspects in common. Fantasy Interpretation of Natural Elements

Elements is an online slot game that features four natural elements, including air, water, fire, and earth, presented in a fantasy setting. The backdrop includes mountainous views, valleys, and an active volcano. The slot reel's symbols are composed of rocks with the various natural elements enclosed within them, along with special symbols such as water beings, fire and electricity golems, and air dragons.

Cascading Mechanism

Elements features a cascading mechanism where symbols fall from above instead of the reels. In the event of a winning combination, the symbols involved in the combination will get absorbed by a central talisman that will load with energy. Other symbols then fall from above, creating a chance for a concatenated win. To fill the talisman, players must achieve four concatenated wins.

Concatenated Wins

Elements has a concatenated win system where players can receive multiple wins in a single turn. This system involves the cascading mechanism, where symbols that form a winning combination will get absorbed by a talisman, and new symbols will fall from above, giving players the opportunity to get more winning combinations.

Review: Elements: The Awakening

NetEnt is one of the most appreciated online slot developers today, thanks to its ability to range from the most common themes to the least used ones. Elements certainly belongs to this second category, using as its theme the elements on which the Earth is based (wind, fire, and more), which we will see in detail in this review.

So enough talk, let's start our analysis by talking about the visual aspect of this game.

Elements: all elements accounted for

Netent's Elements has a rather atypical setting for slots, as it focuses on the four natural elements: air, water, fire, and earth, and does so in their most fantasy-centric interpretation.

Let's start with the backdrop which captures typical landscapes of the genre with glimpses of mountains, valleys, a cliff, and even an active volcano. All in colors that are rather dark but well blended together, making the background pleasant and easy on the eyes.

Moving on to the slot reel, the classic symbols are replaced by some rocks that enclose the natural elements such as drafts of air, water drops, burning coals, or lightning bolts. Along with these, there are also special symbols represented as water beings, fire and electricity golems, and air dragons.

Elements is visually unique and out of the ordinary. As for the sound, there is little to say. In fact, there is no musical background accompanying the gameplay except for solemn music that is heard only during certain combinations. The sounds, although generic, are in line with the fantastic setting of the slot.

But now let's move from the aesthetic to the technical side of Elements.

Elements: How to Play

Although the absence of a real game grid could make us think differently, Elements actually uses a very common 5x3 mechanism in online slots. The fifteen symbols that appear with each play are arranged in combinations according to the twenty paylines.

The real novelty comes in the cascading mechanism: we are not talking about falling reels, but symbols that fall from above. In the in the case of a winning combination, the involved symbols will be absorbed by a central talisman that will load with energy, while other symbols fall from above and give the opportunity to obtain concatenated wins.

To completely fill the talisman, it will be necessary to obtain four concatenated wins, a challenge in itself but one that will reward the patience and luck of players who manage to complete it.

In short: we are facing an original game in many ways and one that proves to be certainly more interesting than many other more inexperienced titles that can be found online.

Similar Games to Elements

It is not easy to find titles that share the theme of this slot, as it is particularly unique. For this reason, we can instead choose to recommend other slots from the same developer that have some technical aspects in common. Fruit Case, also from NetEnt, also enjoys a combined win system with attached prize, for those who want to try something fresher and lighter after the epicness of Elements.
